data.text: @AMNH Why are you still discriminating unvaccinated people? It is un-American and it is against CDC recommendations. NYC mayor lifted all restrictions, but you still enforce medical segregation.

@MouthyOldBat @JamilaElGizuli @savvygray83 @AMNH You're a mouthy old bat that is brainwashed bc if it works it HAS NOTHING TO DO with others it's FOR THE ONE who takes it..I didn't put that for u to spew ur unintelligence  & ignorance. @JamilaElGizuli @savvygray83 @AMNH I assumed you were opposing the Museum of Natural History's policy of requiring masks and proof of vaccination with your strident support of Person wihout a party's post about the policy invading your medical history.  Otherwise, why did you even respond?

@CocolosoR @JamilaElGizuli @savvygray83 @AMNH "Can't prevent transmission" doesn't mean that they don't reduce transmission.  Anything that can possibly slow down transmission is a good thing.  Please remember that Delta could have been avoided completely with 100% of the population vaccinated.
